name: Untitled document
description: Language Architect at Work! (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

input_value.name: input_value
input_value.info: The input value to pass to the chain.

memory.name: memory
memory.info: Memory to load context from. If none is provided, a ConversationBufferMemory will be used.

code.name: code

node.description: Chain to have a conversation and load context from memory.

code.name: code

google_api_key.name: google_api_key
google_api_key.info: The Google API Key to use for the Google Generative AI.

max_output_tokens.name: max_output_tokens
max_output_tokens.info: The maximum number of tokens to generate.

model.name: model
model.info: The name of the model to use. Supported examples: gemini-pro

n.name: n
n.info: Number of chat completions to generate for each prompt. Note that the API may not return the full n completions if duplicates are generated.

temperature.name: temperature
temperature.info: Run inference with this temperature. Must by in the closed interval [0.0, 1.0].

top_k.name: top_k
top_k.info: Decode using top-k sampling: consider the set of top_k most probable tokens. Must be positive.

top_p.name: top_p
top_p.info: The maximum cumulative probability of tokens to consider when sampling.

node.description: A component that uses Google Generative AI to generate text.

files.name: files
files.info: Files to be sent with the message.

code.value:
from typing import Optional

from axiestudio.base.io.chat import ChatComponent
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message
from axiestudio.field_typing import Text
from typing import Union


class ChatInput(ChatComponent):
    display_name = "Chat Input"
    description = "Get chat inputs from the Playground."
    icon = "ChatInput"

    def build_config(self):
        build_config = super().build_config()
        build_config["input_value"] = {
            "input_types": [],
            "display_name": "Text",
            "multiline": True,
        }

        return build_config

    def build(
        self,
        sender: Optional[str] = "User",
        sender_name: Optional[str] = "User",
        input_value: Optional[str] = None,
        files: Optional[list[str]] = None,
        session_id: Optional[str] = None,
        return_message: Optional[bool] = False,
    ) -> Union[Message, Text]:
        return super().build_with_record(
            sender=sender,
            sender_name=sender_name,
            input_value=input_value,
            files=files,
            session_id=session_id,
            return_message=return_message,
        )
code.name: code

return_message.name: return_message
return_message.info: Return the message as a Message containing the sender, sender_name, and session_id.

session_id.name: session_id
session_id.info: If provided, the message will be stored in the memory.

node.description: Get chat inputs from the Playground.

files.info: Files to be sent with the message.

from axiestudio.base.io.chat import ChatComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import Text
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message


class ChatOutput(ChatComponent):
    display_name = "Chat Output"
    description = "Display a chat message in the Playground."
    icon = "ChatOutput"

    def build(
        self,
        sender: Optional[str] = "Machine",
        sender_name: Optional[str] = "AI",
        input_value: Optional[str] = None,
        session_id: Optional[str] = None,
        files: Optional[list[str]] = None,
        return_message: Optional[bool] = False,
    ) -> Union[Message, Text]:
        return super().build_with_record(
            sender=sender,
            sender_name=sender_name,
            input_value=input_value,
            session_id=session_id,
            files=files,
            return_message=return_message,
        )
